summary: Disables the insufficient magicka sound in-game.
descriptionHtml:
I foud the \"insufficient magicka\" sound in-game to be too intrusive, I mean, isn\'t it enough that I\'m already not casting the spell?

So I made this mod to remove it.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

---INSTALLATION---

Drop in the main game folder.


---UNINSTALLATION---

Remove the \\Data\\sound\\fx\\mgk\\firebolt\\mag_firebolt_fail.wav file.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

ENJOY!
author: diegocmr
